sentence.Network_en: Spores normally resist desiccation and have many ordinary procedures of disinfection.

sentence.Network_en: Desiccation The drying out of an organism due to evaporation.

entry.def: Desiccation is the process of becoming completely dried out.

example.ex: ...the disastrous consequences of the desiccation of the wetland.

means.word_mean: 1. dryness resulting from the removal of water
